author: radekkapka
content: Hey <@466006586477772831> , I have a question about https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/pull/60. When the client receives a response from the `getHeader` request, how will it know if the response is Bellatrix/Capella? The way this is done for execution payload in CL <--> EL interaction is that the EL will always include a `withdrawals` attribute, even if just an empty list. And for Bellatrix the field is non-existent or `null`

author: radekkapka
content: Maybe we could agree an a similar behavior and specify it in the method's description?

author: radekkapka
content: ah I see it has a `version` property
